abstract: Hewlett-Packard is finding ways to cut costs by reducing the number of property mangers and scurity firms it contracts with.
snippet: Hewlett-Packard is finding ways to cut costs by reducing the number of property mangers and scurity firms it contracts with.
lead_paragraph: Hewlett-Packard, the world’s largest technology company, has been on an unending search for ways to cuts costs under Mark V. Hurd, the chief executive.

headline.main: Hewlett-Packard Makes Life Easier for Its Accounting Department
